imdb.title: Kimi ni todoke
imdb.plot: Sawako Kuronuma is misunderstood due to her resemblance to the ghost girl from The Ring. But one day the nicest boy in the class, Kazehaya befriends her and everything changed after that and also everyone perspective of Sawako but...

episodes.title: Kataomoi
episodes.plot: A recap of Ume and what she's done so far.

episodes.title: Barentain
episodes.plot: It's Valentine's day and Sawako makes chocolates for her classmates but can't bring herself to give them to Shoto.

episodes.title: 2-Nensei
episodes.plot: Kento ends up volunteering to be the class rep and Sawako tends to the flower beds. Pin (Kazuichi Arai) kept the students who are close, together.

episodes.title: Wasurete
episodes.plot: Sawako makes some herbs with what looks like curse notes next to them.Kento tries to get Sawako to smile. Kento makes Sawako hold a study session.

episodes.title: Wakattenai
episodes.plot: Kento tells Shoto that he should stop treating Sawako nice because people might get jealous. Shoto avoids Sawako, Chizuru and Ayane ask Sawako why.

episodes.title: Suki no hito
episodes.plot: The class decides to do Sawako's Black Magic Cafe as an exhibition. Chizuru and Ryu go to Toru's (Ryu's older brother) wedding. Kento tells Sawako that Shoto likes someone else.

episodes.title: Koi to Meiwaku
episodes.plot: Shoto sees Kento holding Sawako's arm and her crying so Shoto gets angry at Kento. Shoto tells Sawako he likes her and she tells him she likes him but they both think the other means as friends.

episodes.title: Akirame Chimae Yo
episodes.plot: Ume tells Sawako that she hurt Shoto and that they are not the same. Kento says to Sawako that he thinks that Shoto does actually like her. Ayane, Chizuru and Ume tell Kento to stop getting involved in other peoples business.

episodes.title: Todoke
episodes.plot: The school festival begins and Sawako's Black Magic Cafe is a success. Kento thinks there is a wall between Sawako and Shoto. Sawako says that she doesn't care who Shoto likes, she is going to tell him how she feels.

episodes.title: Kokuhaku
episodes.plot: Sawako thanks Shoto for what he has done for her and tells him that she like him. Shoto hugs Sawako but then the two are interrupted by Joe. The girls and then the boys are disturbed by Pin (Kazuichi Arai).

episodes.title: Koko kara
episodes.plot: The class is done with their costumes for the school festival. Sawako ends up playing a ghost. The class win for refreshment stands but receive zero points for the costume parade because they bribed the judges.

episodes.title: Matsuri no ato
episodes.plot: Sawako and Shoto are together. People think Sawako did black magic to get Shoto to like her. Kento tells Shoto why Sawako was crying and thinks that Shoto and Sawako make a good couple.

episodes.title: Daiji na hito
episodes.plot: Some of the girls that like Shoto find out that he and Sawako are a couple, which makes them angry at her but Ume tells them that Shoto doesn't like girls that are acting the way they were. Ryu tells Chizuru that he like her.

episodes.title: Puroroogu
episodes.plot: Kuronuma Sawako is often misunderstood and feared by others for resembling a horror movie character. She enters her new high school hoping that she can make new friends. Her chance comes when she volunteers to be a ghost for a school activity.

episodes.title: Sekigae
episodes.plot: Sawako finds a lost puppy and Kazehaya decides to take him in. The class seats are shuffled and Sawako learns that she might have more friends than she first thought.

episodes.title: Hokago
episodes.plot: Kazehaya and Sawako grow closer together and end up performing some classroom chores together after school.

episodes.title: Uwasa
episodes.plot: Rumors are circulating about Sawako's friends, Ayane and Chizuro. It is said that Sawako started these rumors, but she is unaware that anything is going on at all. When approached about it, Sawako hesitates in her response.

episodes.title: Ketsui
episodes.plot: The group is plagued by questions. Did Sawako start these rumors? Why would she do that? Who could really be responsible? No answers are in sight and Sawako shrinks back into her old ways-quiet and alone.

episodes.title: Tomodachi
episodes.plot: The rumor-mongers are outed and confronted when they decide to move against Sawako. Sawako learns who her true friends are.

episodes.title: Doyo no Yoru
episodes.plot: Sawako is invited to hang out with friends for the first time ever. She meets up with Ayane and Chizuru, and then spend some time at Ryu's place. Kazehaya is invited over and everyone has a wonderful time.

episodes.title: Jishuren
episodes.plot: New rumors are circulating! Apparently, making Sawako laugh gives you good luck! Kazehaya's old friend Kurumi begins to get involved in things. Sawako and Kazehaya grow closer.

episodes.title: Atarashii Tomodachi
episodes.plot: Kurumi decides to become friends with Sawako in order to get closer to Kazehaya, herself. Ayane and Chizuru are suspicious of this eternally-cheerful girl.

episodes.title: Kyoryoku
episodes.plot: Sawako finds herself unable to avoid Kurumi, who pops up around every corner to offer support or ask for something. An unfamiliar feeling surrounds Sawako and Kazehaya, who grow too flustered to speak with one another like they used to.

episodes.title: Tokubetsu
episodes.plot: Kurumi has told Sawako her big secret, but Sawako apologizes and says that she cannot help. Kurumi reveals her true colors, but Sawako remains undeterred and promises to remain her friend.

episodes.title: Ren'ai Kanjo
episodes.plot: During a school event, Sawako finds a mysterious note in her shoe locker. Apparently, Ryu has something to admit to her. Kurumi and Kazehaya intervene with the worst possible timing for Sawako...

episodes.title: Koi
episodes.plot: Kurumi's ultimate plan backfires, as Kazehaya pulls Sawako away in private when he finds her alone with Ryu. The misunderstanding is cleared up instantly, but the feelings stirring within both Sawako and Kazehaya only get more confusing.

episodes.title: Kurumi
episodes.plot: The girls confront Kurumi, who has done everything in her power to pull Kazehaya away from Sawako and toward herself. Despite admitting to it all, Sawako forgives Kurumi and continues to treat her like a friend.

episodes.title: Raibaru
episodes.plot: Bolstered by the resolve shown by Sawako, Kurumi thinks about her past with Kazehaya and decides on her future. She faces Kazehaya, swallows her fear, and tells him the truth...

episodes.title: Yobanashi
episodes.plot: Drunk men giving a recap of what has happened so far.

episodes.title: Yasumi no hi
episodes.plot: Sawako's friends, Chizuru and Ayane spend time with her at her house and meet her mom and dad. Pin gets a cold but thinks he is possessed. Sawako, Chizuru, Ayane, Ryu and Shota take care of Pin when he's sick.

episodes.title: Chizuru no Koi
episodes.plot: Ayane is annoyed her boyfriend always wants to know what she is doing. Chizuru wants to get Ryu something for his birthday. Sawako finds out who Chizuru loves.

episodes.title: Yume
episodes.plot: Sawako is sleeping over with Ayane and Chizuru. Chizuru decides to see Ryu. Ryu tries to tell Chizuru that he likes her but then his older brother, Toru comes home.

episodes.title: Purezento
episodes.plot: Ryu's brother leaves. Ryu says something to Chizuru that makes her angry. Sawako and Ayane don't know what to do to cheer Chizuru up and Shoto gives them advice.

episodes.title: Hatsuyuki
episodes.plot: Chizuru and Ryu's older brother, Toru walk around and talk about the past. Chizuru and Ryu managed to get along.

episodes.title: Kurisumasu
episodes.plot: Shota invites Sawako to a Christmas party and she accepts. Sawako sees how excited her dad is about Christmas and decides to stay with her mom and dad on Christmas and not go to the Christmas party she was invited to.

episodes.title: Futari
episodes.plot: It's going to be new years eve and Sawako's birthday, she plans on going to visit the shrine of the year with Chizuru, Ayane, Ryu and Shota.

episodes.title: Tanjobi
episodes.plot: Sawako and Shoto walk to the shrine in silence until Ayane, Chizuru and Ryu call Shoto to say the sorry for not coming. Shoto finds out that it's Sawako's birthday.

episodes.title: Shinnen
episodes.plot: Sawako and Shoto get the fortunes, Shoto get's extremely good luck and Sawako get's bad luck. When walking home Shoto mentions that this is where they first met and Sawako is surprised he remembered.
